content: Giftly

Giftly is a service that allows users to send a gift to someone without having to know their address. Users can purchase a gift card, and the recipient can choose from a list of participating merchants to redeem their gift.
Purchase gift cards without needing recipient address, wide range of participating merchants to choose from, easy redemption process, customizable gift message, no expiration date
Giftagram, Bouqs, Harry & David, Greetabl
Giftly allows for more flexibility in gift-giving, as the recipient can choose the merchant they prefer to redeem their gift card.
LearnLive

LearnLive is an online tutoring service that provides affordable, personalized one-on-one instruction. Tutors are available in a variety of subjects, and students can schedule sessions at their convenience.
Affordable pricing, personalized instruction, one-on-one attention, real-time communication, flexible scheduling
Varsity Tutors, Chegg Tutors, TutorMe, Wyzant, Skooli
LearnLive focuses on providing personalized attention and real-time communication with its tutors, setting it apart from other online tutoring services.
SkillSwap
SkillSwap is a platform that allows users to exchange tutoring services with each other. Users can offer their own skills in exchange for tutoring in a subject they need help with.
Free service, wide range of subjects available, personalized attention, flexible scheduling, opportunity to learn new skills
Preply, Tutors.com, HeyTutor, Tutorful, Club Z!
SkillSwap offers a unique approach to tutoring by allowing users to exchange skills and knowledge with each other, creating a collaborative learning environment.
BrainBoost
BrainBoost is an online tutoring service that focuses on academic coaching and skill development. Tutors work with students to develop strategies for success in their coursework and beyond.
Academic coaching, skill development, personalized instruction, one-on-one attention, real-time communication
TutorMe, Varsity Tutors, Skooli, Wyzant, Chegg Tutors
BrainBoost sets itself apart by focusing on long-term skill development and coaching, rather than just short-term academic performance.
pain_point_description: many students struggle to find affordable and accessible tutoring services, which can affect their academic performance. traditional tutoring services can be expensive, and online tutoring services may lack personal touch or real-time communication. a service that provides affordable online tutoring with real-time, personalized attention could be invaluable to parents and students alike
audience_title: send a gift without knowing the recipient address
